overview: Simple living yet peaceful.  First was his brother, a balut vendor.... next was his father who was just happy watching a mock-fight....  Followed by his mother.  They were all killed without mercy and his beloved sister got raped.  Diego a.k.a. Diegong Bayong had his revenge and put law on his hand and no one dares to blame.
tagline: What if killing was done without mercy?
title: Diegong Bayong
